DataSourcePortable.Name: CRM_QTDE_EMPRESAS_AUTOGERADAS_FILIAL_DIRETOR_GERAL
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) QTDEEMPAUTOGERADAS
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS
WHERE USUARIOEXECUTIVO IS NOT NULL
AND USUARIORESPONSAVEL IS NULL
AND FILIAL = @FILIAL
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTDEEMPAUTOGERADAS" From="A" Path="QTDEEMPAUTOGERADAS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
